title: Home and Away's Sarah Roberts' brother dies after battle with brain cancer
text:
(Picture: Sarah Roberts/Instagram)

Home and Away star Sarah Roberts has revealed that her brother Karl De Abrew has died after a 15-year battle with brain cancer.

The actress — who plays Willow Harris in the Channel 5 soap — took to social media to share the news of Karl’s passing.

Posting a series of pictures of her brother on her wedding day, Sarah wrote on Instragram: ‘3 months ago today he walked me down the aisle & now he is walking with the angels’

‘I’m left with a hole in my heart & 34 years of beautiful memories… growing up together as children into adults.’

‘You fought THE BRAVEST battle Big Squirt to the very end and I promise to always live by your standards; to remember what you taught me, “it’s all about the journey, not the destination” & “have no regrets”. I love you, I cherish you, I salute you. You can rest now, we know you’re dancing up there in the heavens, always watching down on us. Forever all my love, Medium Squirt x @karldeabrew’

Sarah’s wedding took place earlier this year in Dublin — where Karl lived — as he wasn’t well enough to travel for the ceremony.

Sarah spoke to Who magazine back in August about her decision to hold the ceremony in Dublin, saying: “My brother lives over here. He’s not able to fly at the moment because of health reasons. And my mum’s over here at the moment as well.’

Several of Sarah’s Home and Away co-stars posted their messages condolences, with Ashleigh Brewer saying: ‘Sending all the love in the world to you Sar x’ while Esther Anderson commented: Sending you and your family all the love right now’. Georgie Parker added: Sarah, we love you and wish we could help take some of this pain away for you. Huge love and thoughts to your family’.
